short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alation’s Chrome Extension integrates data intelligence into your browser, helping you find, understand and trust data instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Empower teams to seamlessly discover and access trusted data and BI assets, view automated side-by-side previews with apps such as Snowflake’s Snowsight, Tableau (Cloud and Server), PowerBI and Looker.
Quickly reference glossary terms with content menu search, all within their browsers.
